title: Zone List
description: A basic list of assets, in order as shown on front-ends.

chain_name.description: Chain name as used in the Cosmos Chain Registry

base_denom.description: Base denomination as used for the asset in the Cosmos Chain Registry

frontend_properties.description: Properties that should not follow the Chain Registry, and behave or appear differently on different front ends.

symbol.description: Overriding symbol of an asset. For example WBTC.axl instead of WBTC

chain_name_pretty.description: [OPTIONAL] Overriding name of an asset's chain. For example Osmosis instead of osmosis or Terra 2.0 instead of terra2.

coingecko_id.description: [OPTIONAL] The coingecko id to fetch asset data from coingecko v3 api. See https://api.coingecko.com/api/v3/coins/list

keywords.description: [OPTIONAL] An array of up to 20 keywords to describe the asset. Examples are: Native, Derivative, Liquid-Staked, Wrapped/Bridged, Fiat-Collateralized, Anchored, Utility, Reflexive
